title: E-Commerce Technical Support Personnel
description:
Job Requirements and Qualifications:  

* At least 1 year of work experience as a Customer service representative and/or technical support expert
* Knowledge of customer service principles and practices, and working with difficult clients.
* Knowledge to navigate hardware, software, network, operating systems, and protocol
* Experience in the e-commerce field will be PLUS

  

MAIN DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES  

  

* Coordinate and support all of the activities of the Technical Support team to ensure an effective support service for digital signage systems and related equipment.
* Manage, develop, administer and technically support the technology infrastructure for EZ-AD
* Understand Database & Technical systems for you to be able to effectively assist the customer
* Work with a cool developer team and project managers so they can build out better systems for you and the customers!
* Provide technical support to Technical Support Team (including both internal and external users), covering both hardware and software systems, in accordance with the company’s agreed service standards.
* Escalate all unresolved service issues to the Technical Services Manager.
* Implement agreed-on procedures for hardware and software audit, security, and inventory.
* Participate actively and flexibly in a range of company activities, such as daily meetings, call schedules, and customer conference calls.
* Participate in training and team development activities to update skills and knowledge.

  

You will be receiving extensive training in Technical knowledge, including understanding programming fundamentals and database management. You will learn how to figure out people’s problems by looking at database tables and some basic code, and working with developers on getting the solutions completed for our clients!  

  

ABOUT US  

  

We are EZ-AD - a focused team of talented and skilled individuals dedicated to creating beautiful software that provides real value to our users!!  

  

We do several projects for large companies such as Disney, Verizon, Red Bull, ADP, Dippin Dots, Ace Hardware, True Value, and many others companies.  

  

We are continuously growing and seeking new people to join our team. If you are PASSIONATE about TECHNOLOGY, love your work, and love interacting with new people to strive to make great things happen, then this opportunity is for you!  

  

A few of our cool projects:  

  

https://disney.ezad.io/cruella/  

https://disney.ezad.io/raya-experience/  

  

What is EZ-Commerce?  

EZ-Commerce is an advanced e-commerce platform for hardware retailers that allows you to become your own Amazon and Uber all in one. Some key features are the automatic integration of products right from your POS system to showcase on your website (which can be completely customized) and a unique user experience allowing your customers to purchase right on the go.  

Available both on desktop and mobile responsive, you can get all your orders to sync into your POS and also push to our EZ-AD manager app allowing you to make delivery and pick up right from your business.  

EZ-Commerce is being used by 2,000 hardware stores; it has processed over a hundred million products and 25 million dollars in orders; We are proud to say that our technology has become an essential part of our client's success.  

What our Success Specialist can expect from us:  

We are a supportive group of “A players” and a big family that cares about the well-being of our organization's members. We offer the opportunity to go through great and difficult challenges and come victorious altogether.

title: Product Manager
description:
**About the Opportunity**


Small businesses are the backbone of our economy. Today, more than ever these businesses are struggling to survive. Our mission is to help small businesses grow, make their lives easier and their businesses more efficient. We automate commerce for these businesses, so they can spend more time growing and less time dealing with operational hassles. Our SaaS platform processes over $7B of GMV each year and powers over 5,000 ecommerce companies. If you're passionate about solving real-world problems, building cool $hit and helping small businesses win, come join us!


*Webgility is fully remote in the United States with offices in Scottsdale, AZ and Indore, India. We embrace flexibility and you can work from anywhere in the US.*


**Why Work for Us**


We're a fast-paced company with a diverse team of smart, ambitious and fun people. We want to make a difference in the lives of our customers because we're not happy with the status quo. We empower our teams with data, tools and big ideas so they can truly transform their careers. We offer many opportunities for professional growth and we're not shy to express ourselves and our creativity. We're a group of diverse professionals located across the US and India.


At Webgility, we value strong, positive relationships within our teams, our customer base, business partners and our communities. The ideal candidate will demonstrate a passion for product and technology, but also be a strong communicator willing to collaborate. We are looking for someone who is comfortable in fast-paced environments with competing priorities, excited by collaboration and driven to solve problems for small businesses!


**The Impact You Will Make**


* You'll own the strategy, execution and delivery of Webgility's Ecommerce accounting products to drive revenue growth
* Drive the go-to-market strategy for key product launches and evangelize the product across all channels
* Own the entire customer experience lifecycle and collaborate with marketing, sales, and customer success teams
* Be the voice of the customer in driving product features to delivery with the support of a remote development team
* Become an Ecommerce and Accounting expert and articulate the product strategy and roadmap for the entire team, partnering closely with key stakeholders, both internally and externally
* Work closely with the product team, architects, developers and designers to prioritize and deliver on high-impact initiatives in inventory, payments, fulfillment, supply chain, and much more.
* Research and validate new opportunities through user surveys, data analysis, user testing, competitive analysis and interviews
* Identify and measure key success metrics for customer and business impact.


**What You Bring to the Table**


* 3-5 years of proven product management experience, preferred to be in a SaaS Ecommerce or Accounting environment
* 3-5 years of experience in Retail, Ecommerce, Supply Chain Management, Business Analytics or Finance
* Deep curiosity and customer empathy
* Experience in working with remote development teams in India
* Highly quantitative and enjoy analyzing lots of complex data
* Strong process driver with expertise in Jira and/or other project management software
* Strong product management and technical skills having comfort in a fast-paced, Agile Scrum environment
* Exemplary communication skills, including the ability to distill, refine and socialize key findings into stakeholder needs
* Ability to manage competing priorities, make recommendations, be able to compromise and develop new ideas with stakeholders, and be able to deliver a consensus while keeping customer needs at heart
* Love working in teams and not shy to roll up your sleeves
* Proven track record of taking ownership and driving measurable outcomes with a history of successful delivery of large-scale projects with high-quality, while managing the entire life-cycle
* Self-starter and able to motivate teams to deliver initiatives from conception to launch
* Strong academic track record (MSc or PhD preferred) in computer science, mathematics, operations research or a related discipline
* Mush have 4 hours overlapping working hours with India team ( 8am-12am EST)


**What we offer**


* Competitive base salary range of $120-140k (DOE)
* 20% annual bonus opportunity paid quarterly
* Unlimited Paid Time Off
* Competitive healthcare benefits
* Twelve paid holidays and four mental wellness days each year
* 401(k) tax-deferred savings plan
* $100 monthly tax-free stipend for phone and wifi expenses
